content: Is it about time to move forward again?
I think the required Cargo fixes have landed a while ago

In general I think the status quo from that time was that teams and repos should start moving as they wish. We expected some more effort for this to happen on the rust-lang/rust side (i wonder how much effort it actually is?)
I think in general this is a good time to start poking at this again. Also for all the other repos; if someone has the time to make all the right changes
Ping? If this is the wrong audience to ask, who should I ask instead? Is there something I could do to help out?
hmm, we can discuss this at the next infra meeting
but I'm not sure the team currently has the bandwidth to update all the infra to switch from master to main
Doesn't look like this got discussed at the 2021-12-20 meeting
IMO there was a good reason originally to migrate from master to main
So I am still wondering when Rust is going to get there
hmm, I agree there was good reason, but I don't think anyone has time to either do or review the required infra changes
